Reviews.Title: WOW!!!
Reviews.Author: The One
Reviews.Content: I selected 2 - 3day shipping, i placed the order thursday morning around 3am and received the package friday afternoon. Camera works well and the extra stuff they sent was all there. Will update review if things change for now 5 stars

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Robert J. Curry "Bob Curry"
Reviews.Content: Wow, what can you say about the 7d but that is a fantastic camera. I had a 50d I sold to get this camera and love the difference and still working on learning the video part of it.
